title: Bathtime Fun!
description: Bathtime is FUN!!! Find out why in this bubbly, fun-to-read-aloud, tugboat adventure. With bright, bold, and playful illustrations, diverse characters, and an engaging, rhythmic text, this delightful book is sure to spark the imagination of young readers everywhere. When you combine adventure with getting clean, bath time is a fun time!
author: Kathleen Gauer
